venue.address_2: Exit 19 off Rte. 495. Turn at BKing
venue.name: DOUBLETREE HOTEL

item.description:
[b]"THE LARGEST SINGLES DANCE ORGANIZATION IN NEW ENGLAND."

Saturday, DECEMBER 12, at the Doubletree Hotel, 11 Beaver St., Milford. 508-478-7010. Exit 19 off Rte. 495.
www.se-4u.com
Complimentary hors d’oeuvres. 9-10 PM.
Numerous free door prizes and MATCH game prizes.
HUNDREDS OF SINGLES, 35-60 years old.
Terrific dance music by award-winning DJ. …8:30-12 AM.
Cost is $12 all night.
Proper business dress required…sports jacket, or tie, for men required; business or party finery for women.
Co-Sponsored by The Young Professionals Club, and The New England Association of Singles.
item.how_to_find_us: ASK FOR PAM AT THE DOOR.
item.name: "THE SINGLE EXECUTIVES CLUB" CHRISTMAS PARTY & DANCE
